nodes.text: Durasilk was one of many materials used to contruct tents. Tents made out of advanced durasilk could also include internal self-assembling memory supports.

Durasilk was first mentioned in the 2019 canon Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game sourcebook Gadgets and Gear. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, durasilk was first introduced in the 2002 novel The New Jedi Order: Dark Journey, written by Elaine Cunningham.
